name: CrepCake
detail: It is a sweet dessert to eat. Delicious crepe with creamy texture, sweet cream, overlapping layers and many colors. And a pour of water to eat. Not expensive too.

taste.name: greentea
taste.detail: This green tea crepe crepe is a creamy green crepe dough mix with fresh creamy white creamy and very green tea.

taste.name: chocolate
taste.detail: Chocolate cake crepes are crepe cakes with chocolate filling. Mellow taste Bitter because it is a real chocolate

taste.name: stawberry
taste.detail: Crepe cake cake strawberry It is a regular crepe cake. But there is a strawberry sauce made from genuine strawberry. The taste is sour, sweet, mixed together.

taste.name: rainbow
taste.detail: Rainbow Cake Crepe is a crepe cake with water coloring to help decorate the various colors. Then topped with strawberry sauce will add more delicious and colorful colors as well.

taste.name: nutella
taste.detail: Crepe nutella crepe flavors of intense chocolate. By the way, the nutella chocolate comes in to make with flour. Makes it softer and smoother.

taste.name: healthy
taste.detail: Crepe Cake is a crepe cake that is suitable for people who like to eat healthy. It is made from plants that have low calorie benefits but have many nutrients.
